Game Description

A VR strategy-tower defense game, which you can act as a witch who want to protect the crystal from monster.

Inspired by Ancient_Amuletor

Mechanics

The basic control is as follow:

As a witch, you can trap enemies with magic circles, then use different magics to defeat them.

But using magic doesn't come for free, you must follow by certain rules.

We have developed 3 types of magic.
